Statute.Title: Countering Foreign Interference Act
Statute.OtherLangTitle: (Lutte contre l’ingérence étrangère, Loi sur la)

General.Text: Note: 2024, c. 16, ss. 57 (3) and (4), 98 and 99: Regulations

CoordinatingAmendment.Text: Coordinating amendments, 2024, c. 16, ss. 72 to 74, 109 to 111

CIF.Text: CIF, 2024, c. 16 in force on assent 20.06.2024, except,

Item.Text: — ss. 49 to 71 in force on the 60th day after the day on which this Act receives royal assent see s. 75 (19.08.2024)
— ss. 76 to 97 and 100 to 107 in force on the 60th day after the day on which this Act receives royal assent see s. 112 (19.08.2024)
— s. 113, enacting ss. 1 to 35 of the Foreign Influence Transparency and Accountability Act come into force on a day to be fixed by order of the Governor in Council see s. 117 — Not in force
— ss. 114 to 116 come into force on a day to be fixed by order of the Governor in Council see s. 117 — Not in force
